trait.description: You recive 1D6 to all your INT checks and int-related skill checks. You recieve -2 + 1D4 to all your WIS checks and WIL related skill checks.
trait.name: Absent Minded Genius

trait.description: Character can steal a total of Lvl skill levels from other people. When a skill level is overwritten by another one, then the target the first skill was stolen from gets it back. This skill may not be kept for more than lvl hours.
trait.name: Absorb Skill

trait.description: Character can absorb the surface attributes of a non-living substance. For example, if the character wants to absorb a stone surface, his skin gains the hardness of stone, and the limb is unmovable, until the surface is released.
trait.name: Absorb Surface Structure

trait.description: Character can stick to surfaces, allowing him to run--climb up wall and ceilings as if he was walking normally.
trait.name: Adhesion

trait.description: You critical fail on all rolls of 1, 2, or 3. You automatically succeed on rolls of 18, 19, and 20.
trait.name: Agent of Fate

trait.description: Character takes no damage from physical damage. Crushing attacks tend to splatter the character. Severed limbs in this form are regrown if there is a source of water. Fire damage deals x3 damage. Ice will freeze the character, but no damage.
trait.name: Alternate Body Substance

trait.description: Noah needs to describe this.
trait.name: Animate Dead

trait.description:
[LaTeX]
This is a stand in. A character may take a magical spell of any rank as a \emph{Trait}. They do not need to buy \emph{Magical Control}, \emph{Spellcasting}, \emph{Faith}, \emph{Mysticism}, etc. The rank of the specific \emph{Trait} is the rank of the spell. For purposes of control (striking, LVL, etc.), the level at which the \emph{Spell Ability} has been purchased is used for these calculations. The cost of using the ability is the same Mana Point cost as the spell itself.
\quotexample[Ignaceous Charcot Flamm\'{e}]{Ignaceous' alter-identity is the mutant superhero, \emph{Flame-On!}\footnote{The exclamation point is part of the name.}. He has the following \emph{Arcane Talents}: \emph{Fireblast} at Level 4, \emph{Fire Shards} at level 4, \emph{Flame Shroud} at level 1, \emph{Living Fire} at level 1, and \emph{Flame Whip} at level 2. Although he feels it was unnecessary, his secret master has been forcing him to train in the ``mystic arts'' to learn to control his powers better (\emph{Mysticism}, level 3). Although he thinks it's bunk, and wasn't necessary, he can certainly use his powers longer nowadays.}
We note that for \emph{Flame Whip}, \emph{Fire Shards}, and \emph{Fireblast} the description in says to ``roll'' to determine if Ignaceous strikes. Ignaceous would roll his \emph{level} he has purchased the skills at, i.e. levels 2, 4, and 4, respectively.
trait.name: Arcane Talent

trait.description: You recive plus 1 on ALL non-combat skill rolls, except when hurried.
trait.name: Attention to Detail

trait.description: Upon activation, all those that see the character must make a willpower roll at -Lvl*2. If unsuccessful, than those affected are VERY likely to agree with the character, and even less likely to attack him. Lasts for CHA minutes.
trait.name: Awe

trait.description: (Teleportation Dodge) - Character can Blink out of the way of an attack. Roll to dodge at LVL D + (DEX or WIL)
trait.name: Blink

trait.description: You recive +2 on academic skill rolls. You recive a +1 when those rolls are rushed or hurried. If you have Mental Training then you receive the +2, hurried or not.
trait.name: Bookworm

trait.description: No falling damage, crash damage, etc. Character will bounce like a rubber ball.
trait.name: Bouncing

trait.description: You recive a constant bonus of 2 STR and 2 BLD. You loose one action in combat, permanently. Your speed is reduced by 1 and you are at -1 to all INT and WIS skill rolls.
trait.implementation: Strength += 2*Level; Build += 2*Level; Speed -= 1*Level; Intelligence -= 1*Level; Wisdom -= 1*Level; Height *= pow(1.1,Level); Weight *= pow(1.25,Level);
trait.name: Brute

trait.description: Character can dig a tunnel through almost any substance (even granite and other hard stones) at a rate of Lvl mph
trait.name: Burrowing

trait.description: Equivalent to a camo skill of lvl, takes 1 action to transform into a new pattern.
trait.name: Chameleon

trait.description: Character may communicate with lvl animals at a time
trait.name: Communicate with Animals

trait.description: Character may communicate with lvl demons at a time
trait.name: Communicate with Demons

trait.description: Character can talk to any machine that is within 20*Lvl feet away. It can be persuaded to do things for the character.
trait.name: Communicate with Machines

trait.description: Character may communicate with lvl spirits at a time
trait.name: Communicate with Spirits

trait.description: Character can control up to a total of ( LVL--2 ) ^2 * 30 cp worth of spirits. The spirit must obey any commands until death.
trait.name: Control

trait.description: Character can make lvl targets at a time deaf for 1 turn.
trait.name: Deafen

trait.description: Character can shift between Lvl other dimensions.
trait.name: Dimensional Travel

trait.description: Target looses Lvl-2 actions and -2*Lvl to all actions for Lvl d 4-1 turns. Considered an electric attack. Touch.
trait.name: Disruption (Nervous System)

trait.description: Character does not need to breathe.
trait.name: Doesn't breathe

trait.description: You recive +1 DEX for purposes of contortion, escaping from bonds, and maneuvering in tight places. Opponents trying to put you into a weapon lock or martial arts hold have an extra -2 to succeed.
trait.name: Double Jointed

trait.description: Character can steal Lvl HP from target, and gain Lvl HP. Requires touch.
trait.name: Drain HP

trait.description: Character can steal Lvl^2 * 5 MP from target, and gain Lvl^2 * 5 MP. Requires touch.
trait.name: Drain MP

trait.description: Character gets no additional negatives (or fall unconscious) by dropping below 0 or more HP for Lvl turns.
trait.name: Durable

trait.description: Once per day you may take +2 INT for one skill roll or attribute check. However, you are then at -2 CHR for the rest of the day.
trait.name: Egghead

trait.description: +1 on all academic skill rolls. +1 on all WIS checks. +1 LVL to trivia skill. Once per day you may add +1D4 to one academic skill roll.
trait.name: Eidetic Memory

trait.description: Character emits an odor up to 10*lvl^2 feet away. Purchase for each odor.
trait.name: Emit Odor

trait.description: Character can absorb up to 5*Lvl points of damage in energy per turn. Each 5 points absorbed in this way may be converted over to one HP point.
trait.name: Energy Absorption

trait.description: For each level, your 'whole side' gains 2 initiative.
trait.name: Enhanced Moral

trait.description: For each level, your 'whole side' gains 2 initiative.
trait.name: Faith

trait.description: Character can create fireworks type flashes within 20 * lvl feet. Anyone within 10*lvl feet from activation area gets - 1 actions for Lvl d 4-1 turns. And is at a -lvl to all actions for that duration.
trait.name: Fireworks

trait.description: Character can fly with a speed of 10*Lvl mph (or 15*Lvl if carrying very little). Wings are a good minor flaw.
trait.name: Flight

trait.description: Character can float a few inches above the ground or smooth water. Can move at Lvl^2 mph.
trait.name: Float

trait.description: Erect a FF with a radius of up to Lvl * 5 ft around character. Can take Lvl^2 * 25 damage. Opponents are +1 to strike the forcefield. FF regenerates Lvl HP per hour.
trait.name: Forcefield

trait.description: 4*Lvl gallons of water flow out of the character per second. Requires a STR check at -Lvl or be washed away.
trait.name: Generation

trait.description: Character can create a ball of darkness with radius of 15 x Lvl feet
trait.name: Globe of Darkness

trait.description: Character can create a ball of light with radius of 15 x Lvl feet
trait.name: Globe of Light

trait.description: Character is inhumanly gracefull. His motions are never jerky, always smooth transitions from one position to the next.
trait.name: Grace

trait.description: You gain +1 CHR and +1 BLD. However, this bonus only applies if you have followed a particular diet and--or training regimen that day.
trait.name: Hard Body

trait.description: You recive natural armor of X--X+1--X where X is equal to half your level in that skill.
trait.name: Hardened Worker

trait.description: Character can heal others with a touch. The target gains Lvl HP per turn.
trait.name: Healing (Others)

trait.description: You may choose to wear skimpy clothing instead of standard armor. You recive armor equal X--X--X where X = (CHA-8 +LVL of Beauty + LVL of Fashion Skill). This has no encumberance. You cannot use ability while wearing armor of any kind.
trait.name: Heroic Armor

trait.description: or whatever the character normally needs to breeth for lvl hours at a time
trait.name: Hold Breath

trait.description: You recive +1 CHR with respect to dealings of the opposite sex. You recive -1 CHR for dealings with the same sex.
trait.name: Hot Stuff

trait.description: Character will not age while the power is activated.
trait.name: Immortality

trait.description: Character is completely immune to all diseases (this includes poison type spells as well).
trait.name: Immune to Disease and Poisons

trait.description: Character takes no damage from falling.
trait.name: Immune to Falling

trait.description: Character can jump an additional Lvl^2 feet
trait.name: Increased Jumping Distance

trait.description: Character can run at Lvl^2 MPH
trait.name: Increased Speed

trait.description: Character takes no physical damage and may walk through substances. Note that this does NOT grant the character the ability to fly or hover. He must still walk, though he may dive into a substance.
trait.name: Intangibility

trait.description: Character is completely invisible to visible light. A good minor flaw would be that the character still has a shadow.
trait.name: Invisibility

trait.description: Slashing attacks deal 0 damage.
trait.name: Invulnerability

trait.description: You recive +3 to all BLD checks involving acts of endurance
trait.name: Ironman

trait.description: Character can absorb up to 5 * Lvl points of damage from kinetic damage (P--S--C) per turn. Each 5 points absorbed in this way may be converted over to one HP point.
trait.name: Kinetic Absorption

trait.description: Can throw just about anything with amazing force. Thrown objects deal an additional Lvl D 4 P, S, or C damage.
trait.name: Kinetic Acceleration

trait.description: Character emits enough light to illuminate (like day) an area up to 5*Lvl^2 in radius.
trait.name: Light Emit

trait.description: Character is completely undetectable when within a bright light that will cover his natural body. Others can still FEEL the character.
trait.name: Light Meld

trait.description: You earn luck at double the normal rate. However, your max luck is always no more than 2 points.
trait.name: Lucky SOB

trait.description: Character is completely immune to all magic attacks and effects (good an bad) with 1 success on Lvl D + 10 (roll for good AND bad spells and effects). This does include magic that is thrown at him.
trait.name: Magic Immunity

trait.description: You have a natrual ability to sense the presence of magical abilities and objects. You recive the ability to detect magic as if you had Magical Studies LVL2. If you already have that skill, gain +1 LVL to all your rolls.
trait.name: Magical Affinity

trait.description: Character can manipulate up to Lvl^3 * 10 pounds of metal. Metal pieces may be thrown for an attack (one action) that deals Lvl D 6 S--P--C damage.
trait.name: Magnetism

trait.description: Character can melt into a puddle that can flow through cracks, etc. He still weighs the same, and takes up the same volume. He is COMPLETELY defenseless, and can only move at 1 foot per second. 0 Base Armor and immune to physical attacks.
trait.name: Melt

trait.description: Copy the supernatural abilities from other characters as long as the total cost of the abilities has no more than Lvl * 20 character points.
trait.name: Mimic

trait.description: Character can move through the substance at a rate of a slow walk. Name the substance at purchase time. Character can take anything he is wearing with him, nothing else.
trait.name: Move Through Substance

trait.description: Character can make 1 target at a time mute for Lvl turns.
trait.name: Mute

trait.description: Character has some form of natural (or mystical) covering that gives him Lvl^2 P--S--C protection and Lvl U protection.
trait.name: Natural Armor

trait.description: (Claws, fangs, etc) Deals Lvl D 4
trait.name: Natural Weaponry

trait.description: +1 on all CHR based skill checks and attribute checks. You are -3 to all rolls involving seduction.
trait.name: Nice Guy

trait.description: Character can see in absolute darkness for up to Lvl*20 feet
trait.name: Nightvision

trait.description: You recive +3 to CHR-related skill or attribute checks that involve diplomacy and negotiation. You also recive +2 to skill checks related to investigation or detecting lies.
trait.name: Nose for Truth

trait.description: Character feels NO pain. He is not adversely affected by hit-point loss (though he still looses HP, and will die when -HP is reached).
trait.name: Pain Block

trait.description: Character can deal damage to invulnerable creatures.
trait.name: Pierce Invulnerability

trait.description: Character can control up to Lvl^2 * 10 pounds of plant material. Can be used to attack others (takes one action) with the plants, deals Lvl D 6 C damage.
trait.name: Plant Control

trait.description: Character can take control of another creature if it has fewer character points than he does. His original body appears to be sucked into the new body. If the new body is killed, the character pops back out.
trait.name: Possession

trait.description: Name substance the field is made of. The character is surrounded by a swirling field of substance. Any attacks of this substance that passes through field is reduced to 0 damage. All other damage is reduced by a quarter.
trait.name: Protective Field

trait.description: Sends the character to a little pocket of reality. He can leave when he wishes, time does not pass outside of pocket. Character still ages within the Reality Pocket.
trait.name: Reality Pocket

trait.description: Character can regrow any limb at a rate of Lvl pounds per day.
trait.name: Regeneration

trait.description: Slashing attacks deal 1--2 damage.
trait.name: Resistance

trait.description: Character can accelerate the deteriation of organic matter (by a LOT). Character must touch the object. Can rot Lvl pounds of organic matter per second.
trait.name: Rot Substance

trait.description: Character may see anything that is invisible
trait.name: See Invisible

trait.description: Character can bring himself back to life Lvl number of times. He revives with full abilities, HP, etc.
trait.name: Self Resurrection

trait.description: Character can detect how many HP the target has.
trait.name: Sense HP

trait.description: Character can detect how many MP the target has.
trait.name: Sense MP

trait.description: Character is completely undetectable when within a deep shadow that will cover his natural body. Others can still FEEL the character.
trait.name: Shadow Meld

trait.description: Character can change the form of his body. This includes fairly basic transformation, growing hair, changing skin color, shift body mass, etc.
trait.name: Shapeshift

trait.description: Character can shift 4*Lvl attribute points around at a time.
trait.name: Shifting Attributes

trait.description: Character gains Lvl sizes, gains 2^Lvl Strength, looses Lvl Dex, multiply HP and Base Armor by 2^Lvl.
trait.name: Size

trait.description: Character sees the world in slow motion. Character gets lvl additional attempts to parry an attack.
trait.name: Slow Motion

trait.description: You recive +2 to deception, forgery, and social engineering type skill rolls. You recive +1 CHR for purposes of seduction and deception.
trait.name: Smooth Operator

trait.description: Character can emit and hear VERY high and low pitched sounds (think bats here) as well as very quite or loud sounds. Can be used as an attack that deals Lvl D 4 U damage.
trait.name: Sonic Control

trait.description: Take control of LVL spirits whose character points are fewer than your own.
trait.name: Spirit Control

trait.description: Character can create Lvl clones of himself. Can regenerate a dead clone in a month.
trait.name: Split Body

trait.description: Ability to turn into a non-moving statue (name the substance at purchase) at will. Character is COMPLETELY undetectable by ANY means to be anyting but a statue. Statue image and size are what the character looked like upon entering the state.
trait.name: Statuation

trait.description: Character steals one ability from the target (requires touch) if that ability cost less than Lvl * 20 cp. If another ability is stolen, the owner of the previous ability gets it back.
trait.name: Steal Supernatural Ability

trait.description: Character makes no sound.
trait.name: Stealth

trait.description: Character can stretch up to Lvl times as long, or 1--Lvl times as thin as he currently is. This gives the character an additional 0--0--Lvl*2 personal armor
trait.name: Stretchability

trait.description: Character can create a trail of substance that is used to surf on. The trail must be anchored to something, but can be as long as needed. Speed is 10*Lvl MPH. It takes 40*Lvl damage before it will be destroyed. Name substance when purchased.
trait.name: Substance Surfing

trait.description: Purchase per attribute that is at least a 20. Increase the max attribute to 20 + lvl^2, and purchase additional points as if the base attribute is 1--2 the current attribute.
trait.name: Supernatural Attribute

trait.description: You recive +2 to all Dex checks involving balance, jumping, or remaining standing.
trait.name: Sure Footed

trait.description: Character can teleport up to Lvl^2 * 5 miles away that he can see or has been.
trait.name: Teleportation

trait.description: You do not fall unconcious when you drop below 0 HP
trait.name: The Champ

trait.description: Character can transfer Lvl HP to a target per second. Requires Touch
trait.name: Transfer HP

trait.description: Character can transfer Lvl ^2 * 5 MP to a target per second. Requires Touch
trait.name: Transfer MP

trait.description: Character can initiate a grip that requires a strength of STR+Lvl^2. Adds Level to any grappling skill.
trait.name: Unbreakable Grip

trait.description: Character can walk on air. He can walk up air steps, go over air bridges, even create air walls (for himself only).
trait.name: Walk on Air

trait.description: Acts as an 8th level skill in ONE weapon, no other weapon skills may be bought by the character
trait.name: Weapon Master

trait.description: Character can control the weather (basic stuff here, no tornadoes, huricanes, etc) for an area of Lvl^2 square miles.
trait.name: Weather Control

trait.description: When whirlwind is active, the character appears to be an opaque tornado (think Tasmanian Devil here). All projectiles will be deflected. Anything that comes in contact with the character will receive 3D6+2 C damage.
trait.name: Whirlwind

trait.description: Character can withstand high and low pressure environments. This includes a vacuum and underwater.
trait.name: Withstand Pressure

trait.description: Character can see through any substance that is no more than Lvl^2 feet thick.
trait.name: X-Ray Vision
